name: The Close
description:
Welcome to The Close!

This is a Slender/AI chasing game that involves you collecting all 12 keycards to escape the building without getting caught.

Background -

Your an employee at Mcdonald's and you don't want to clean up after your shift so you storm out. The manager doesn't take this news very well, he begins to hunt you down and calls the security guards to help.

Since it's the end of the day the main store's front doors are closed, this leaves only one available exit...through the upstairs way and out the side door. The stairs exit door is locked however so you must search around the whole store collecting the key cards to open.

Controls -

E - Interact

Esc/P - Pause

L-Shift - Sprint

L-CTRL/C - Crouch

NOTE: This is the very first game that I've ever worked on so expect hiccups :) Also, updates in the map shall be coming soon model wise.

DONATION: This game is 100% Free and developing games is expensive. So any amount of donation will really help us to improve and to fund our upcoming games. Thank you!
